name: OverDog: Play Your Favorite Athletes in Your Favorite Games
blurb: Exclusive access to receive and accept video game challenges from all of your favorite athletes in all the games you love

rewards.reward: High Five! We thank you for any help you can offer and appreciate funding at any level.  Perhaps you're not a gamer (and don't know one who would love a friendly gift) but are interested in staying up to date with latest OverDog news.  We appreciate your support and can't wait to get started.

Beta Subscriber.  Subscription for the first 3-month period of OverDog.  You will have unlimited chances to compete with OverDog athletes during the prototype period.  We're closing the app to the general public until August, so this is your best chance to play against all of the athletes you love in all of your favorite games.  You're not a gamer?  No worries.  Send us the name and gamertag of a friend, child, parent, sibling . . . anybody.  OverDog makes a great gift.

Early Bird.  Our first 300 supporters will receive an OverDog subscription through the end of 2013.  Early Bird supporters will have access during the initial 3-month prototype phase (while the app is closed to the outside world) and will be the first to interact with the complete app in the fall. In addition, each Early Bird will receive a badge of distinction as an OverDog OG, "Original Gamer" attached to their OverDog profile forever.

Subscriber.  Our core level of participation.  Subscribers will have access during the initial 3-month prototype phase (while the app is closed to the outside world) and will be the first to interact with the complete app in the fall. Your access to the athletes on the platform will never get better. You also get the OverDog OG, "Original Gamer" badge of distinction attached to your profile forever.

Starting 5. 5 subscriptions. You get to be the nice guy (or girl) responsible for inviting 4 buddies to join.  This can be especially fun if you prefer multiplayer games like Call of Duty, where maybe you can even add your favorite athlete to your elite ops team.  Subscriptions include everything listed above (plus the adoration of your friends or children or co-workers or youth basketball team)

Forever Subscription.  Rather than having to repurchase access to OverDog athletes at the start of each year, Forever Subscribers earn lifetime red carpet access to OverDog and special athlete-benefits. Let's review: lifetime value, special access to athletes, a personal thank you from the OverDog team - all for less than the cost of a prime seat to your local sports team.  And, of course, a Special OG badge included denoting your status as lifetime elite.

Forever Five.  Five forever subscriptions.  By forever, we mean they don't expire until you do.  Can't figure out what to get your boyscout troop, your pledge class, your co-workers, or your quintuplet sons?  This may be the best gift they've ever received. Special OG badge included denoting your special status as lifetime elite.

MLS Package. A guaranteed game of FIFA 13 with a player from your favorite MLS team.  You let us know your favorite team and OverDog will set it up.  Usually, OverDog stands for anytime/anywhere gaming at nearly zero cost, but for our Kickstarter campaign, we're arranging these special scheduled games for our best fans.  2013 Subscription included.

NFL Package. A guaranteed game of Madden 13 with a player from your favorite NFL team.  You let us know your favorite team and OverDog will set it up.  Usually, OverDog stands for anytime/anywhere gaming at nearly zero cost, but for our Kickstarter campaign, we're arranging these special scheduled games for our best fans.  2013 Subscription included.

MLB Package. A guaranteed game of MLB The Show or MLB 2K13 (we refuse to choose for you) with a player from your favorite MLB team.  You let us know your favorite team and OverDog will set it up.  Usually, OverDog stands for anytime/anywhere gaming at nearly zero cost, but for our Kickstarter campaign, we're arranging these special scheduled games for our best fans.  2013 Subscription included.

NHL Package. A guaranteed game of NHL 13 with a player from your favorite NHL team.  You let us know your favorite team and OverDog will set it up.  Usually, OverDog stands for anytime/anywhere gaming at nearly zero cost, but for our Kickstarter campaign, we're arranging these special scheduled games for our best fans.  2013 Subscription included.

Anchor Down Package (aka the Beat Hunter Package). Playing on this tv may ruin your living room experience forever.  A couple lucky fans will have the chance to play OverDog President and 2003 Vandy grad Hunter Hillenmeyer in a game of your choice on the Vandy big screen in Memorial Gym.  We're working with Vandy to figure out how many of your buddies will be able to witness the carnage.  2002 was the last year Hunter was on the big screen at a Vandy sporting event (and roughly the last time he was good at Madden).  Unfortunately, travel is not included but a Forever Subscription is.

The Kluwe Experience.  Describing a day with OverDog advisory board member Chris Kluwe any other way would be shortchanging him.  One lucky fan will have the chance to receive a punting lesson (in Minneapolis), play some video games (likely World of Warcraft), and soak in the wisdom from the NFL's most interesting man. Unfortunately, travel is not included but a Forever Subscription is.

Hang with Hank. Advisory board member Hank Baskett lives a charmed life. He trains professional athletes at his gym, plays video games in his man cave, and still manages to find time with his wife and son to star in reality television shows.  Spend an afternoon gaming with Hank in his man cave, grab a work out at his gym, and finish with a nice dinner.  Trust us, with Hank, you never know who else is gonna join the party.

Nashville Package. Each individual winner will join Hunter and receive (a) 2 Club Level tickets to a Titans game of their choice, (b) 2 Owner's Seats to a Predators game of their choice (right on the glass) with Hunter Hillenmeyer and the Preds' owners, and (c) dinner with Hunter and the Preds' owners before the Preds' game.  This may be the greatest Nashville sports package ever offered.  Unfortunately, travel is not included but four Forever Subscriptions are.

Nashville Hero Party.  Each individual backer and up to 50 of your closest friends will join Hunter and a group of all-star Vanderbilt heroes for an afternoon of games, pizza, and flag football.  You choose whether you want Hunter on your team or not.  We'd take him.  Unfortunately, travel is not included but two Forever Subscriptions are.

Cover Athlete Battle: Calvin Johnson.  Megatron obliterated the Madden curse last season, donning the cover of EA's Madden 2013 and going on to have the best single season by a receiver in NFL history. See how the video game version of Calvin matches up.  Take him on in a game of Madden13.    Forever Subscription included.

Chicago Package. Each individual winner will join Hunter and receive (a) 2 court-side (your feet are literally on the court) tickets to a Bulls game, (b) a guaranteed game in Madden13 with a current Bear, (c) 2 Club Level tickets to a Bears game of your choice, and (d) dinner with Hunter after the Bears game.  Somewhere, the SuperFans are smiling. Unfortunately, travel is not included but two Forever Subscriptions are.
